title: Compact All Tasks cards by moving field tag into TaskCard

requirements.summary: Remove the standalone field badge above each task in All Tasks and render the field tag as a small badge inside the TaskCard header near the title.
acceptanceCriteria: All Tasks view no longer shows a separate field badge above each card.
Each task card in All Tasks view shows the field tag inside the card as a small badge.

file_operations.description: Remove the current Badge rendered above each TaskCard and instead pass the field name/tag down to TaskCard as an optional prop for in-card display.

Add an optional prop for a field tag label and render it as a Badge in the card header row near the task title (only when provided), so All Tasks can show the field tag inside the card without affecting other TaskCard usages.

requirements.summary: Reduce vertical spacing in the All Tasks list and within TaskCard to make the list more compact without changing functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: Vertical spacing between task cards in All Tasks view is reduced compared to current behavior.
TaskCard actions and content remain usable and visually clear after spacing reduction.

file_operations.description: Tighten list layout spacing for All Tasks (e.g., reduce container/list vertical spacing utilities and remove the extra per-item wrapper spacing now that the external badge is removed), keeping the same task ordering, filtering, and sorting behavior.

Reduce excess vertical padding and internal gaps in TaskCard (e.g., CardContent padding and section spacing) while preserving all existing actions (complete/undo, edit, delete) and dependency display clarity.

requirements.summary: Preserve the field tagâ€™s current visual badge style when displayed inside the TaskCard.
acceptanceCriteria: The field tag inside the task card uses the same styling (e.g., outline badge appearance) as before.

file_operations.description: Ensure the moved field tag continues using the same Badge variant/styling as before (keep using the outline Badge styling that was previously rendered above each card), only changing placement.
Render the in-card field tag using the same Badge variant used previously in AllTasksView (outline), avoiding style changes beyond minimal sizing/placement needed for a compact header row.
